medical_history.chief_complaint: Abdominal pain several hours after eating high-fat foods.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The abdominal pain began three days ago and has persisted since its onset, localized in a band-like distribution along her upper abdomen, periumbilical, and suprapubic regions. The pain does not radiate and is somewhat diminished, but the abdomen remains tender. It is not exacerbated by movement.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Pancreatic insufficiency treated with Creon, diagnosed ___ years ago; cholelithiasis; GERD diagnosed since pregnancy; type 2 diabetes; hypertension; polymyalgia rheumatica; rotator cuff tear.
medical_history.family_history: Father - possible gastric cancer with an ostomy; brother - lung cancer; mother - hypertension and stroke; niece - previous cholecystectomy complicated by common bile duct injury.
